name: newman-reporter-slack-extended
description: Reporting to slack with a custom message

scripts.buildrun: npm pack && npm install -g .\newman-reporter-slack-extended-1.0.4.tgz && newman run ".\dontcheckin\Account Management API.postman_collection.json" -e ".\dontcheckin\TEST - NB.postman_environment.json" -r slack-extended > ../output.txt

author: testheader
